title: #59: The Evarts Family w/ Brad Evarts, Julie Evarts, & Myles McKeown-Evarts -How to Get a Man, Blending Families, & Marriage Tips
itunes:title: #59: The Evarts Family w/ Brad Evarts, Julie Evarts, & Myles McKeown-Evarts -How to Get a Man, Blending Families, & Marriage Tips
description:
Brad Evarts, Julie Evarts, & Myles McKeown-Evarts join Lauryn & Michael for a family discussion about what it was like growing up in a blended family, parenting styles, not settling, the importance of getting involved in your partners interests, how young people can blend their lives in a productive way, and why being a team in a marriage is key.

To connect with Lauryn click HERE

To connect with Michael click HERE

This episode is brought to you by The Skinny Confidential Bombshell Body Guide and Meal plan. 

tired of combating inflammation & bloat? Want to feel lighter and sexier?

In this simple & super effective plan you’ll find:

+ tsc grocery list with every ingredient you need for the 7 days.

+ quick and delicious recipes: breakfast, snacks, lunch, dinner and dessert.

You will also find 28 weeks worth of fat burning, muscle toning, 27 minute long, effective workouts you can do at home with no equipment.
